pages.text: $(li)Glowsquitos are an horrible pest that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/glowstone_canyon)Glowstone Canyons$(/l) of the Nether.$(br)$(li)These neutral creatures loves sucking the dust out of $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/glowstone_block)Glowstone$(/l), turning it to Dimstone and finally to Dullstone.$(br)$(li)You can breed Glowsquitos giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/infernalexp/shroomlight_tear)Shroomlight Tears$(/l).
$(li)Be careful if you attack one of these creatures, because after that, all of them will attack you.
